title: Let's trade:  T206 SGC HOFers Matty, Keeler, Walsh, Waddell, Young
author: David R

posts.post_title: Let's trade:  T206 SGC HOFers Matty, Keeler, Walsh, Waddell, Young
posts.post_content:
I am looking for any of the following HOFers with a Piedmont 350, Sweet Cap 350, 25 or Sweet Cap 350-460, 25 back:

Matty Portrait
Matty White Cap
Young bare hand
Young glove
Lajoie bat

I have all the cards below with Piedmont 150 backs that I could trade or I have cash.  I can send scans if anyone has an interest in a possible trade.  The SGC 30 Mattys are extremely nice for the grade (they look better than the 40s).  

Mathewson Portrait SGC 30
Mathewson White Cap SGC 30
Waddell Portrait SGC 30
Young bare hand SGC 40
Walsh SGC 40
Keeler portrait SGC 40
Jimmy Collins SGC 30 (Pied 350)

I also have a Tinker Portrait SGC 40 EPDG back that I would trade, preferably for another Tinker portrait with a semi-tough back.

Thanks,
David R
Added a few new cards above
